name: Eclipse: Sköll & Hati
description:
CONTROLS

Move: WASD

Jump: Spacebar

Attack: "J"

Dash (night only): "K"

double-jump (day only): Spacebar

GAME OVERVIEW

Sköll & Hati travell midgard to free Fenrir and kickstart the Ragnarok.

  • Comic like introduction. Experience the story of the Ragnarok via an animated visual novel by our amazing arts team.

  • Engaging plataforming. Conquer the challenging platforming across Midgard.

  • Fearful Enemies. Defeat an army of Asgardian warriors or challenge the invincible Berserks.

CONCEPT

Hack and slash platformer with strong narrative and hints of horror, where two wolfs, Sköll & Hati, will travel through day and night across different scenarios, collecting motes of sun & moon to free Fenrir, but be careful of the Aesir who are chasing you.

GENRE

Horror 2D Hack and slash Platformer.

TARGET

Young adults who love mythology and the beat ‘em up genre

LEVELS

5 LEVELS

TEAM MEMBERS

  • Carolina Bernárdez: Game Design, Production, Narrative Design, scriptwriting
  • Ricardo Portnoy: Game Design, Production, Narrative Design
  • Erick Amaro: Game Design, Production, Narrative Design, scriptwriting
  • Andrea Perez Bolde: 2D Art, Environment Art, Animation
  • Jesús Israel López Castro: 2D Art, Environment Art, Illustration
  • Karla de la Loza: Tech and Rigging
  • Víctor Ferruzola: Tech and Rigging
  • Julio Bernárdez: Sound Design & Score
  • Matías Jara: Sound Design & Technical Sound Design

GAMEPLAY & MECHANICS

GAMEPLAY

2d Hack and slash Platformer

OBJECTIVES

Gather motes of light by defeating enemies, avoid the Aesir and free Fenrir from his bindings.

MECHANICS

Platform with double jump and dash defeating enemies by attacking and hide from the Aesir to advance and reach the end.

MOVMENTS,OBJECTS AND ACTIONS

MOVE: WASD, Jump, Double Jump, Dash, Pick up Objects, Attack.

GAME OPTIONS

Start, Quit, Pause, Resume.
